website_summaries.verdict: The fun of guiding DK and Diddy Kong across DK Island is only enhanced by the game’s immersive 3D visuals, smooth controls, and ability to play anywhere.
pros: 8 more levels than the original Wii version
Many collectables to find and secrets to unlock

customer_reviews.title: Blood pressure rises, yet I keep coming back for more
customer_reviews.text: This is both frustrating and addicting. The timing of the jumps and moves is so crucial, which makes it a really challenging game. I keep coming back to it, even though I sometimes want to throw the console at the wall in frustration. On the other hand, I have definitely improved my gaming skills with this game, as well as my patience and perseverance. Plus, the levels are wonderful to go through - maddening, but wonderful.
customer_reviews.author: Kate

customer_reviews.title: Reliving my childhood....
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a gift for my son. I loved Donkey Kong growing up, so I'm hoping he'll love it too! If not- I'll just play it after he goes to bed.
customer_reviews.author: andy w

customer_reviews.title: This game holds up well
customer_reviews.text: It's as good as it ever was. Starts out easy, but the difficulty quickly ramps up. it's a great game for us older gamers who remember when it first came out and who remember how great it's graphics were at the time. In exchange for the graphics, the game is not as long as other comprable games such as Super Mario World. It's not the best platformer ever made for Super NES but it is very important historically.
customer_reviews.author: Smaug

customer_reviews.title: Was a gift to my wife qho was going in ...
customer_reviews.text: Was a gift to my wife qho was going in hospital for major surgery and she took one of our kids handheld with her. She loves it as it brings back her childhood

customer_reviews.title: Great platformer that will give you a challenge!
customer_reviews.text: An awesome game that I have for the Wii, yet I haven't got to play it yet. Being that this is portable it was a lot easier for me to get to. It can be a tough plat former. I selected to play it in the classic mode which is more difficult. You will likely die, a lot, as it seems to take a lot of trial and error to see what's coming ahead. A lot of things are difficult to see coming. Still, a load of fun!!!
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy

customer_reviews.title: Great game, great price.
customer_reviews.text: This has to be one of my favorite Donkey Kong games, ever made. Graphics are as to be expected and the gameplay is on point. Very good deal for the price.

customer_reviews.title: Not Really Digging This Game
customer_reviews.text: I'm pretty picky when it comes to platformers and I'm not really a fan of this iteration of Donkey Kong country. The controls are frustrating (especially using the D-pad to duck) and the game is a little too detailed for the tiny 3DS screen. I have a hard time being able to track and control Donkey Kong despite the excellent presentation of the game. If you liked Donkey Kong country, I'd suggest getting the version for the Wii U, or going back and playing the other versions on your Gameboy color
customer_reviews.author: Jacob Llaneras

customer_reviews.title: Great game with improved controls.
customer_reviews.text: Great game and I prefer the control scheme on the 3ds. Waggling the Wii controller to spin was not ideal in a precision platformer. The Wii version was beautiful on a larger screen but the better controls on this version make this experience superior in my opinion.

product_meta.title: Nintendo Selects: Donkey Kong Country Returns 3D
product_meta.description: Nintendo Selects highlights a variety of great games at a great price, including this one. Donkey Kong's smash-hit return to platforming was rebuilt from the ground up and optimized for portable play on the Nintendo 3DS system. Donkey Kong Country Returns 3D comes with all of the ground-pounding, barrel-rolling, platforming action of the original brought to life with stunning 3D visuals. Number of players one.
feature_bullets: Over 70 levels of banana-hoarding fun featuring Donkey Kong and Diddy Kong
Run, jump, climb and defeat enemies through diverse environments until you retrieve Donkey Kong's stolen banana hoard
Lush, layered side-scrolling levels come to life in stunning 3D
Rebuilt and optimized for portable play on the Nintendo 3DS system

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.7 out of 5 stars720 ratings4.7 out of 5 stars
specifications.Pricing: The strikethrough price is the List Price. Savings represents a discount off the List Price.
